Career.
Kawasaki played for three J. League clubs before moving to Europe to be a goalkeeper for Lierse and Standard Liège.
As a member of Japan's national team, Kawashima helped develop a program to improve the foreign language skills of Japanese athletes and coaches who play and coach internationally. He is fluent in English and Italian. He works to improve speaking and listening skills in Dutch, French and Portuguese skills.
